Class HistoryFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.kraken.krakenhax.HistoryFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class HistoryFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Displays the users history, a log of all actions that the user has done or has happened to them.

    • startFirestoreListener

      private void startFirestoreListener(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore db)
      Starts a Firestore listener to observe changes to the current user's profile document.
      Parameters:
      db - the FirebaseFirestore instance used to attach the listener.

    • updateRecyclerView

      private void updateRecyclerView()
      Updates the RecyclerView with the latest history data from the current user. The list is sorted by timestamp in descending order before being displayed.
